General.Name: Chinyang Hold
General.Description: Chinyang Holdings Corp., through its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of polyurethane plastic foam products. The company also offers PVC flooring and synthetic leather products, as well as automobile interior parts. In addition, it provides real-estate marketing, leasing, and trade transaction services. Chinyang Holdings Corp. was founded in 2008 and is based in Busan, South Korea.

1.Name: Mr. Gyu-Ho  Lim
1.Title: Vice Chairman and Co-Chief Exec. Officer

2.Name: Jun-Young  Yang
2.Title: Vice Chairman and Co-Chief Exec. Officer
